# <a name="search-mail-and-people-on-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="b75f6-102">웹용 Outlook에서 메일 및 사용자 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b75f6-102">Search Mail and People on Outlook on the Web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="b75f6-103">명령 출력의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b75f6-103">In the</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABUAAAAVBAMAAABbObilAAAAKlBMVEX///+WqL7l6u8vUn8iR3azwNDCzNlObJFAYIkDLWNeeZuks8d7ka1thaRtSbf+AAAAS0lEQVQI12MgFjAdmVkKY6csYxK5AGUbAqWsIUzGBiARAmGzCwAJlgQwmyMARiDEEeoxzWEyQZivLAS3l8kQ4RplkDF4hRkWEvQSABbdDSdqA/J0AAAAAElFTkSuQmCC' />
 <span data-ttu-id="b75f6-104">**검색** 상자 페이지 맨 위에 검색할 내용 (연락처, 전자 메일 제목 또는 메시지의 일부)을 입력 하 고 enter 키를 누릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b75f6-104">**Search** box at the top of the page, type what you want to search for (a contact, email subject, or part of a message) and press Enter.</span></span>

2. <span data-ttu-id="b75f6-105">검색이 완료 되 면 뒤로 화살표를 선택 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b75f6-105">When you're done with the search, select the back arrow</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="b75f6-106">검색을 끝내려면 왼쪽 창의 **검색** 상자에서 원하는 폴더를 선택 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b75f6-106">in the **Search** box or select any folder in the left pane to exit the search.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b75f6-107">자세한 내용은 [웹에서 Outlook의 검색 메일 및 사용자](https://support.office.com/article/b27e5eb7-3255-4c61-bf16-1c6a16bc2e6b)읽기를 참조 하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b75f6-107">For more information, read [Search Mail and People in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/b27e5eb7-3255-4c61-bf16-1c6a16bc2e6b).</span></span>
